name: Ghost Babysitter
description:
Plot

Ghost Babysitter is about a ghost who is babysitting a bunch of kids in a mansion. However, when it gets dark the kids have to go into hiding. It's up to you to find where the kids are and tuck them into bed.

*The cutscenes are included in the desktop version. To view the intro cutscenes, watch the youtube video.

Controls

WASD - Movement

E - Interaction

P - Ghost Detect or "Hot 'N' Cold"

* Blue - Cold, Red - Hot
